review_data.title: Good mood food!
review_data.content: Beste butter chicken in town!!! der Service ist outstanding , man braucht kein netflix mehr 😁 and special thanks to the lovely ladies in the kitchen! Defintiv empfelungswert.

review_data.title: cucina vietnamita interessante
review_data.content: porzioni generose ed ampia scelta rendono il ristorante interessante. celere il servizio , gentile il personale .

review_data.title: Good for a quick meal
review_data.content: I come here sometimes when i want something quick and tasty with no fuss. The food is prepared and kept warm so it is quick and appropriately priced. Nothing fancy but good if your hungry or looking for takeaway

review_data.title: Very good neighborhood Vietnamese restaurant
review_data.content: Not fancy but very good food at very, very reasonable prices (for Zürich). Eat in or take-away. Always dependable.

review_data.title: Ideal para llevar
review_data.content: Siempre tienen algún plato vegetariano, o de pescado-gambas o de carne. Las porciones son abundantes. El precio está muy bien.

review_data.title: Fast and tasty vietnameae food
review_data.content: Been there the other day for lunch we seated outside i tried vegetarian pho and summer rolls everything was good and served with a smile, place is authentic my vietnamese friend also liked it and she is a regular customer of them. Worth visiting.

review_data.title: Good and affordable food

review_data.title: Gut, schnell, guenstig

review_data.title: Try somewhere else
review_data.content: We ordered beef with noodles salad. It's way too salty. Another dish we ordered is Pho. The beef is rare. The lady boy staff liked to touch your hand. Guys please be careful.

review_data.title: Good Vietnamese food!
review_data.content: We dropped by Petit Saigon with two families for dinner on the weekend. I have been there for lunch and was disappointed with Europeanized, creamy pseudo-Asian food. It reminded me of the cheap Chinese food from Panda Express at American shopping malls. This time around...More

review_data.title: Great place for a quick meal
review_data.content: Great Vietnamese restaurant, very friendly staff, lots of choice, flexible in mixing and matching them. Good value. Casual, informal dining, takeaway possible. Central location, easily accessible by bus and tram. Would certainly return whenever I found myself in the area.

review_data.title: First visit very good, second visit lacking.

review_data.title: Essen gut! Service - Ich weiss nicht was sagen!

review_data.title: Good morning vietnam!
